author: Omar Rashid
title: U.P. lockdown may be extended
description: ‘Rising number of COVID-19 cases in the State, including those linked to Tabligh’
content:
The lockdown in Uttar Pradesh may be extended beyond April 14, a senior government official said on Monday, citing the rising number of COVID-19 positive cases in the State including those linked to the Tablighi Jamaat.
The number of cases in U.P. touched 30… [+1727 chars]
